--- select_unnest_with_offset.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST([1,2,3]) @{hint = 1} WITH OFFSET

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Unnest{
        Unnest: 18,
        Rparen: 32,
        Expr:   &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  -1,
          Lbrack: 25,
          Rbrack: 31,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 26,
              ValueEnd: 27,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 28,
              ValueEnd: 29,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "2",
            },
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 30,
              ValueEnd: 31,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "3",
            },
          },
        },
        Hint: &ast.Hint{
          Atmark:  34,
          Rbrace:  44,
          Records: []*ast.HintRecord{
            &ast.HintRecord{
              Key: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 36,
                NameEnd: 40,
                Name:    "hint",
              },
              Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 43,
                ValueEnd: 44,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "1",
              },
            },
          },
        },
        As:         (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        WithOffset: &ast.WithOffset{
          With:   46,
          Offset: 51,
          As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        },
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST([1, 2, 3])@{hint=1} WITH OFFSET
